name: Space Cracks! (Post jam)
description:
(Post jam version of Space Cracks)

You were sent to planets that became so unstable that cracks keep forming into the ground! Will you manage to save them and restore them to the beautiful green planets that they once were?

Credits:

  • Art and animations by Filip Grudziel
  • Programming by Guillaume Brunerie
  • Music and sounds come from a Humble Bundle of music and sound effects
